results.description: Job Description You'll actively work in the Power to X - our new technology in the Renewable Gas Team to develop the plant arrangement for Execution projects: Develop the basic engineering of our Renewable Gas plants Prepare, update and check various plans as layout, load tables, construction data, steel construction, platforms, ducting and piping and component drawings Ensure the exchange of layout data with the project team, consortium partners and suppliers Ensure maintainability, accessibil…
